description.value: The skeleton's bones are covered in a thin layer of ice. The skeleton gains immunity to cold and weakness 5 to fire and loses resistance to fire. The skeleton is surrounded by an aura of cold that deals [[/r (max(1,floor(@actor.level/2)))[cold]]]{cold damage equal to half the skeleton's level} to all adjacent creatures at the start of the skeleton's turn (@Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true] save with a standard DC for its level).
